description: This file demonstrates how to create a high-performance filesystem agent by combining Groq's fast LLM inference with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It includes functions to initialize the agent, run it with specific prompts, and examples of usage, focusing on fast file exploration and analysis.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of processing prompts and generating responses.

methods.name: create_filesystem_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures a high-performance filesystem agent using Groq and MCP.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Runs the filesystem agent with a given message prompt, establishing an MCP server connection.
